org.apache.flink.streaming.api.collector

Class DirectedStreamCollector<OUT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.collector.StreamCollector<OUT>
      • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.collector.DirectedStreamCollector<OUT>
  • Type Parameters:
    OUT - Type of the Tuple collected.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Collector<OUT>

    public class DirectedStreamCollector<OUT>
extends StreamCollector<OUT>
    A StreamCollector that uses user defined output names and a user defined output selector to make directed emits.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.apache.flink.streaming.api.collector.StreamCollector
